com.picocontainer.monitors

Class WriterComponentMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.picocontainer.monitors.WriterComponentMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentMonitor

    public class WriterComponentMonitor
extends Object
implements ComponentMonitor
    A ComponentMonitor which writes to a Writer.
    Author:
    Paul Hammant, Aslak Hellesøy, Mauro Talevi

                    ComponentAdapter<T> componentAdapter,
                    Constructor<T> constructor,
                    Object instantiated,
                    Object[] injected,
                    long duration)
        Description copied from interface: ComponentMonitor
        Event thrown after the component has been instantiated using the given constructor. This should be called for both Constructor and Setter DI.
        Specified by:
        instantiated in interface ComponentMonitor
        constructor - the Constructor used to instantiate the addComponent
        instantiated - the component that was instantiated by PicoContainer
        injected - the components during instantiation.
        duration - the duration in milliseconds of the instantiation

      • invoked

        public void invoked(PicoContainer container,
           ComponentAdapter<?> componentAdapter,
           Member member,
           Object instance,
           long duration,
           Object retVal,
           Object[] args)
        Description copied from interface: ComponentMonitor
        Event thrown after the component method has been invoked on the given instance
        Specified by:
        invoked in interface ComponentMonitor
        Parameters:
        container - current container that the invoking component adapter has access to.
        componentAdapter - the component adapter making the invocation.
        member - Method/Field/etc being invoked
        instance - the component instance
        duration - duration of the invocation
        retVal - the returnvalue from the invocation, most often null, may be non-null if a method was invoked.
        args - Arguments invoked on the member

      • noComponentFound

        public Object noComponentFound(MutablePicoContainer container,
                      Object key)
        Description copied from interface: ComponentMonitor
        No Component has been found for the key in question. Implementers of this have a last chance opportunity to specify something for the need. This is only relevant to component dependencies, and not to container.getComponent() in your user code.
        Specified by:
        noComponentFound in interface ComponentMonitor
        Returns:

        Specified by:

        Returns:
